description: Search and retrieve LinkedIn ads effortlessly. Utilize powerful tools to find ads based on keywords, countries, and date ranges, or get detailed information about specific ads. Enhance your marketing insights with real-time access to LinkedIn advertising data.

apiKey.description: API key for the instantmcp API

tools.name: get_linkedin_profile
tools.description: Get details of a specific LinkedIn user profile

linkedin_url.description: The URL of the LinkedIn profile

include_skills.description: Whether to include skills in the profile details. Enabling this option will consume 0.5 more credits.

include_publications.description: Whether to include publications in the profile details. Enabling this option will consume 0.5 more credits.

include_certifications.description: Whether to include certifications in the profile details. Enabling this option will consume 0.5 more credits.

tools.name: get_profile_by_sales_nav_url
tools.description: Get LinkedIn profile data using a Sales Navigator URL

linkedin_url.description: The URL of the LinkedIn Sales Navigator profile

include_honors.description: Whether to include honors in the profile details. Enabling this option will consume 0.5 more credits.

include_skills.description: Whether to include skills in the profile details. Enabling this option will consume 0.5 more credits.

include_courses.description: Whether to include courses in the profile details. Enabling this option will consume 0.5 more credits.

include_patents.description: Whether to include patents in the profile details. Enabling this option will consume 0.5 more credits.

include_projects.description: Whether to include projects in the profile details. Enabling this option will consume 0.5 more credits.

include_volunteers.description: Whether to include volunteer experience in the profile details. Enabling this option will consume 0.5 more credits.

include_publications.description: Whether to include publications in the profile details. Enabling this option will consume 0.5 more credits.

include_organizations.description: Whether to include organizations in the profile details. Enabling this option will consume 0.5 more credits.

include_certifications.description: Whether to include certifications in the profile details. Enabling this option will consume 0.5 more credits.

include_profile_status.description: Whether to include the profile status. Enabling this option will consume 0.5 more credits.

include_company_public_url.description: Whether to include the public URL of the company associated with the profile. Free

tools.name: detect_activity_time
tools.description: Get the time of the latest profile activity. Uses 2 credits per call.

linkedin_url.description: The URL of the LinkedIn profile

tools.name: google_full_profiles
tools.description: Discover LinkedIn profiles via Google using details like job title, company, location, or keywords. Credit Cost: Base cost is 2 credits plus 1 credit per selected profile.

limit.description: Maximum number of profiles to retrieve (default: 5)

tools.name: get_company_by_linkedin_url
tools.description: Retrieve valuable data points using a company's LinkedIn URL. Costs 1 credit per call.

linkedin_url.description: The LinkedIn URL of the company

tools.name: get_company_by_domain
tools.description: Find a company on LinkedIn using its web domain. Costs 1 credit per call.

domain.description: The web domain of the company (e.g., apple.com)

tools.name: get_company_by_id
tools.description: Retrieve valuable data points using a company's LinkedIn internal ID. Costs 1 credit per call.

company_id.description: The LinkedIn internal ID of the company

tools.name: get_company_insights
tools.description: Get company insights from LinkedIn Sales Navigator. Costs 5 credits per call.

company_id.description: The LinkedIn internal ID of the company

tools.name: get_account_iq
tools.description: Get company account IQ from LinkedIn Sales Navigator. Costs 5 credits per call.

linkedin_url.description: The LinkedIn URL of the company

tools.name: find_custom_headcount
tools.description: Discover the count of employees within a specific company who meet designated criteria. Costs 1 credit per call.

what_they_do.description: Array of job function IDs for what employees do

where_they_live.description: Array of location IDs where employees live

what_they_studied.description: Array of field of study IDs that employees studied

where_they_studied.description: Array of institution IDs where employees studied

include_subsidiaries.description: Whether to include company subsidiaries in the search (default: true)

what_they_are_skilled_at.description: Array of skill IDs that employees have

tools.name: get_company_jobs_count
tools.description: Get the number of job openings a company has posted on LinkedIn. Costs 1 credit per call.

company_id.description: The LinkedIn internal ID of the company

tools.name: search_employees
tools.description: Search for LinkedIn employees using Sales Navigator. This is a three-step process that starts with this endpoint. The search costs 50 credits to start, and retrieving each result costs 0.5 credits.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

keywords.description: Keywords to filter profiles (supports Boolean operators)

geo_codes.description: Array of location codes to filter by location

title_keywords.description: Array of keywords to filter job titles

past_company_ids.description: Array of company IDs to filter past employers

geo_codes_exclude.description: Array of location codes to exclude

current_company_ids.description: Array of company IDs to filter current employers

title_keywords_exclude.description: Array of keywords to exclude from job titles

tools.name: search_employees_by_sales_nav_url
tools.description: Search for LinkedIn employees using a Sales Navigator URL. Works the same as regular employee search but uses an existing Sales Navigator search URL as input.

url.description: The LinkedIn Sales Navigator URL for searching employees

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: check_search_status
tools.description: Check the status of a LinkedIn employee search using the request_id obtained from the Search Employees endpoint. This endpoint is free of charge.

request_id.description: The request ID obtained from the Search Employees or Search Employees by Sales Nav URL endpoint

tools.name: get_search_results
tools.description: Get LinkedIn employee search results using the request_id from a completed search. Please ensure search is done before calling. Costs 0.5 credits per result.

page.description: The page number for paginated results. Maximum 100 results returned per page.

request_id.description: The request ID obtained from the Search Employees or Search Employees by Sales Nav URL endpoint

tools.name: search_companies
tools.description: Search for LinkedIn companies using Sales Navigator. This is a three-step process that starts with this endpoint. The search costs 25 credits to start, and retrieving each result costs 0.3 credits.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

annual_revenue.description: Annual revenue range for the company

technologies_used.description: Array of technologies used by the company

hiring_on_linkedin.description: Whether the company is hiring on LinkedIn

headquarters_location.description: Array of location codes for company headquarters

tools.name: search_companies_by_sales_nav_url
tools.description: Search for LinkedIn companies using a Sales Navigator URL. Works the same as regular company search but uses an existing Sales Navigator search URL as input.

url.description: The LinkedIn Sales Navigator URL for searching companies

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: check_company_search_status
tools.description: Check the status of a LinkedIn company search using the request_id obtained from the Search Companies endpoint. This endpoint is free of charge.

request_id.description: The request ID obtained from the Search Companies or Search Companies by Sales Nav URL endpoint

tools.name: get_companies_search_results
tools.description: Get LinkedIn company search results using the request_id from a completed search. Please ensure search is done before calling. Costs 0.3 credits per result.

page.description: The page number for paginated results. Maximum 100 results returned per page.

request_id.description: The request ID obtained from the Search Companies or Search Companies by Sales Nav URL endpoint
